places_with_reviews.name: RG Exclusive Stay & Fine Dine
address: Murtizapur Rd, near RAM LATA BUSINESS CENTER, Kirti Nagar, Akola, Maharashtra 444001, India

reviews.text: Rooms are very Small.. service is not upto mark..Food is Good .. avoid staying as you will not find value for money

I came to Akola to celebrate Diwali. I was amazed by the staff's friendliness and smile.
I felt welcome and the hotel is just perfect. My room was comfortable and clean. Thanks for everything! I will definitely come back soon here!
Definitely 5 stars!!!

"I regret to say that my recent dining experience at your establishment fell short of expectations. The onion salad tasted that had been stored in a refrigerator for an extended period, and the Pinacolada was surprisingly bitter. The tandoori roti lacked the freshness one would expect, being neither adequately heated nor up to standard.

The pricing appeared disproportionate to the quality of the dishes served. I believe it's crucial to address these issues promptly to maintain the trust of discerning customers. Constructive feedback is essential for improvement, and I hope my observations contribute to enhancing the overall dining experience for all patrons."
Worst experience.

Located on Nagpur highway. Easily accessible. Rooms are clean has inhouse restaurant but no bar. Though you can find the bar just 20 steps away (But that's not good one) better to carry your liquor in the room and enjoy with hotel food (which is very delicious)

It's really nice hotel. Neat clean.
Staff is very cooperative.
I am always worried for Tarrif.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shagun
address: Jatharpeth Road, near Brahmin Sabha, Jatharpeth, Akola, Maharashtra 444001, India

reviews.text: Pathetic experience. Rooms are not at all clean. Stain everywhere in the bathroom, bedsheet, pillows, bed. Rooms are big but bathrooms are not maintained well. Will not recommend this as a hotel stay.

It's very good hotel to stay with family. It's besically function hall on ground floor and rooms on 2nd floor. Rooms are very spacious and well maintained. They don't have own kitchen but on walking distance u will find lots of restaurants. Very near from bus stand and railway station

Ok ok service... And room
It is not a reshtarant. Its a marriage hall and rooms
Rooms are cleaned and neat
Nice hotel but location is not quite suitable
Very comfortable stay big rooms avg price

places_with_reviews.name: R.S. Exclusive Stay & Fine Dine
address: Railway Station Rd, near Shah Hospital, Ramdaspeth, Akola, Maharashtra 444003, India

reviews.text: Excellent place for business and personal stays! Nice, clean and quite room, good food and comfortable stay, with easily accessible commute places. Loved staying here recently.
Service is too good. Staffs are very gentle and helpful. Atmosphere is too good . Facilities are first class.

Clean hotel with reasonable pricing. Rooms and bathrooms  are well maintained. In room large screen tv with an effecient ac  and staff. They have an in-house restaurant that serves good food and a small bar which is adequate . Honestly did not expect this quality in Akola . I hope they maintain the standards
Rooms are very neat and good. And the prices are also very affordable

Bad service experience food come 2 hours later after you order foods bad experience . hotel prices are high not services don't go if you can't wait for 3 to 4 hours for your order.staff is not co-operative wasted of money and time bad experience

places_with_reviews.name: VS Imperial
address: Old Balapur Rd, Ayodhya Nagar, Akola, Sukapur, Maharashtra 444002, India

reviews.text: Excellent place to visit. Best suitable for wedding family function. Management is good staff cooperative ambience nice.
Newly built property for funtions like engagement wedding parties and other events in the akola city connected to highway easy to travel and have ample of parking 🅿️
It is a very lavish banquet hall located at old balapur road near akola.

There may be many fake reviews here.
But honest one i will tell.
Hotel is good.
Service is fine even after pressurising.
For small event they charge you very high amount.
Then after the event they will give you random charges even after quoting the final prices.
Manager behaviour is worst, seen many international hotels but never seen such behaviour.
Cleaning is also not up to mark

Had booked this place for our wedding. The hotel is very very good newly built gives very posh look when you enter the lobby . The rooms and very spacious can fit 4 people easily. The halls are huge for hosting function of 200 people on floating basis . It also has a lawn outside for performing functions . Overall good hotel for performing wedding ceremony.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Center Plaza
address: Hotel Center Plaza, Kedia Plot, Holly Cross Convent Road, Ranpise Nagar, Akola, Maharashtra 444001, India

reviews.text: Build in well location but looking to function halls it is sufficient for Birthday parties,  reception and any other function which is for one day.  Now go to the menu it's all over good but somewhere some people feel it tasty some people expectation will not come too much, it all matter to taste everyone has its own expectation about it. Well consider to hall's they are not too much spacious but function like Birthdays, reception and small function is good for it.
GREAT PLACE WITH GREAT FACILITIES LIKE BANQUET HALL, CONFERENCE ROOMS, PARTY HALL AND, COZY ROOMS , OPEN AIR LOUNGE , WITH ADDED ADVANTAGE OF BEING AT HEART OF CITY!

Nice food, service and hospitality
Good place to visit and stay
Good banqet hall, nice catering service.
Reception people not good...room service not good... Over all very pathetic services

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Jasnagra
address: Gaddam Plot Rd, Ramdaspeth, Akola, Maharashtra 444001, India

reviews.text: Food is good, but In akola people are not professional. Everyone was pretending like, that's my city and your outsider. It means when you get this kind of feelings so you won't come next time. Our mumbai is best. Feel comfortable and relax.
Hotel is good but costly. Food is very high rated. Staff is good. Quit place. Professional hotel.

Good location. Good service and good food. Friendly staff.
That said, ancient noisy lift needs replacement.
Good rooms in Akola. Food is good but on the expensive side. Service is also good.
Owner of the hotel is very friendly and courteous.That is really great experience

places_with_reviews.name: Ranjeet Hotel
address: Station Road, behind New Bus Stand, New Radhakisan Plots, Akola, Maharashtra 444001, India

reviews.text:
Had a bad experience, was asked to shift the room to other one in afternoon due to some plumbing work. There was lot of noice due to renovation work in hotel.
Renovation cannot be done at the cost of guest's comfort. Better not to take booking during renovation.
Rest waiters and service staff were very good and cooperative

It was a good experience  , actually .  It's like an out of city hotel 🏨 and staff  are  well behaved , and. The rooms were good ,but   that hall  wasn't good enough 😕.   But 4 out of 5 stars coz of other facilities and staff members.
Good Breakfast....Lovely Ambeiance....Grt Food...Quality and Quantity ..both are good

We were here for dinner ... Food was good ambience is cozy and a small set up but quiet
Naan were small compared but sabzi are tasty
Food was delicious.... Comfortable seating area.. Must visit and try veg maratha sabji there 😋

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Vaibhav
address: Gorakshan Rd, Near Old Income Tax Sqaure, Aadarsh Colony, Akola, Maharashtra 444001, India

reviews.text: They have improved and evolved themselves with the time with great taste. Best sweets in Town ... Kaju katli and Rasmalai will never disappoint you
I had an excellent experience hearing about that school, in future I will be taking admission of my daughter in that......

Basically this place is ancient and has always been hotspot. Also they have recently developed few more floors. Speaking about food, they are everyone favourite in area for fresh and spicy. And for Sweets they have decent number of fresh milk sweets.i would  Definitely recommend this place for snacks. Also they have recently opened Sandwich stall which is really Awesome (bit expensive as compared to local) but seems worth it.
Good place for sweets and snacks
One of the leading breakfast food production in akola,  shegaon kachori is very tasty and cheap

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Greenland Cottages
address: Vidya Nagar, Behind Big Cinemas, Murtizapur Road, NH6, Kirti Nagar, Akola, Maharashtra 444004, India

reviews.text: Beautiful place at nice location.warm welcome by all staff.delicious food ,grt hospitality.kindly take care of all kind of people....in all experience is good .
It was really wonderful experience, food and arrangement were superb and everything was well managed for our event...
Thanks Vintage Vibes and pankaj sir & muzzamal sir great experience on the occasion of our marriage anniversary

Good rooms, very spacious
Room service can improve

It was really amazing to share 5 days with the green land cottage management specially the owner of this beautiful and huge hotel Mr maadhur Bhai Alimchandani.
This hotel has its own beauty,it is constructed with the old mindset of cottages,attached with the 4 floor hotel building.
A fantastic place in between for open sitting dine with the bar attached named Alco.
Staffs are very supportive and quick in their service's,we even had our program of jewellers meet with 100 people's from Akola in their HEART MEETING HALL which is a big A/c hall a part of green land cottage for engagements, get-together,marriages, birthday party's etc with extra buffet area.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Venus International
address: Rukmani Nagar, near Bus Stand, New Radhakisan Plots, Akola, Maharashtra 444001, India

reviews.text: Not suitable at all for families. The beds were not clean, toilets were horribly unclean. I wonder how makemytrip lists this hotel. The hot water is only supplied between 6am - 11am. Wouldn’t recommended to anyone

Horrible place. Staff is willing to serve but management is not supportive. Excess price for horrible rooms. Lift stinking,Gutka spits all around. Bed linen dirty. Stained pillows. Peeling paint. Worst bathroom. Overall greedy owner looting ignorant by posting nice photos and claiming 3:star self rating.no hot water in bathroom,no drinking water in rooms,no tea kit or electric kettle.

Extremely bad service, waited an hour before got served anything and the taste was ridiculous. Veg crispy was just bhajiya full of ajwain. They cannot manage a restaurant, the waiters are also very laid back about everything and forget to bring stuff. Do not recommend at all.
Worst hotel ever checked in ........ They don't give room service  ... I ask for bottel 3 time then they delivered ask for tea 3 time they not even served worst hotel worst service

The term international is probably because there are no water spray in bathrooms.no paper either. Rooms are poorly maintained.
Broken latch in bathroom. Stains on wall and bed. Spider webs behind furniture, window glasses not cleaned in a while. Loud music from party plot behind.Bedsheet did not cover complete matress. Suspicious behaviour from staff not welcoming at all.
